name: procTypeD
description: The processing type at the destination shard. It can be `Normal` or `Scheduled`.

name: procTypeS
description: The processing type at the source shard. It can be `Normal` or `Scheduled`.

name: receiverBlockHash
description: The hash (hex encoded) of the destination block in which the miniblock was included.

name: receiverShard
description: The shard ID of the destination block.

name: senderBlockHash
description: The hash (hex encoded) of the source block in which the miniblock was included.

name: senderShard
description: The shard ID of the source block.

name: timestamp
description: The timestamp of the block in which the miniblock was executed.

name: type
description: The type of the miniblock. It can be `TxBlock` (if it contains transactions) or `SmartContractResultBlock` (if it contains smart contracts results).
